author: Brett Samuels
title: Trump hits Biden for suggesting virus may force Democrat to hold virtual convention
description: President Trump on Monday mocked Joe Biden for suggesting the Democratic National Convention may have to be held virtually due to the coronavirus pandemic, implying it was because the former vice president did not want to...
